control.control:
Container(9000).Hasfocus(1) 290 60 750 550 -1 - 9000 9000 9001 9001
750 45 cirrus_25 31106 accent black left center
750 35 cirrus_20 $LOCALIZE[31126] grey2 white listwhitegradient.png menuitemNF.png Skin.ToggleSetting(LyricScript_Enable) Skin.HasSetting(LyricScript_Enable)
750 35 cirrus_20 - $LOCALIZE[31127] [COLOR=selected]$INFO[Skin.String(LyricScript_Path)][/COLOR] grey2 white listwhitegradient.png menuitemNF.png Skin.SetAddon(LyricScript_Path,xbmc.python.lyrics) Skin.HasSetting(LyricScript_Enable)
750 35 cirrus_20 $LOCALIZE[31129] grey2 white listwhitegradient.png MenuItemNF.png Skin.ToggleSetting(SubtitleDownload_Enable) Skin.HasSetting(SubtitleDownload_Enable)
750 35 cirrus_20 - $LOCALIZE[31130] [COLOR=selected]$INFO[Skin.String(SubtitleScript_Path)][/COLOR] grey2 white listwhitegradient.png MenuItemNF.png Skin.SetAddon(SubtitleScript_Path,xbmc.python.subtitles) Skin.HasSetting(SubtitleDownload_Enable)
Enable Kiosk Mode (disable slideout menu) 750 40 cirrus_20 41006 grey2 white listwhitegradient.png menuitemNF.png Skin.ToggleSetting(kiosk) Skin.HasSetting(kiosk)
Enable CDArt animation on music visualization screen 750 40 cirrus_20 41007 grey2 white listwhitegradient.png menuitemNF.png Skin.ToggleSetting(cdart) Skin.HasSetting(cdart)
Default CDArt Black Cirrus EX 750 40 cirrus_20 41166 grey2 white listwhitegradient.png menuitemNF.png Skin.ToggleSetting(cdart2) Skin.HasSetting(cdart2) !Skin.HasSetting(cdart3) + !Skin.HasSetting(randomdefaultcdart)
Default CDArt White Cirrus EX 750 40 cirrus_20 41167 grey2 white listwhitegradient.png menuitemNF.png Skin.ToggleSetting(cdart3) Skin.HasSetting(cdart3) !Skin.HasSetting(cdart2) + !Skin.HasSetting(randomdefaultcdart)
Random Default CDArts 750 40 cirrus_20 41168 grey2 white listwhitegradient.png menuitemNF.png Skin.ToggleSetting(randomdefaultcdart) Skin.HasSetting(randomdefaultcdart) !Skin.HasSetting(cdart2) + !Skin.HasSetting(cdart3)
Enable New Media Flags 750 40 cirrus_20 41010 grey2 white listwhitegradient.png menuitemNF.png Skin.ToggleSetting(newFlags) Skin.HasSetting(newFlags)
750 40 cirrus_20 20189 grey2 white listwhitegradient.png menuitemNF.png Skin.ToggleSetting(AutoScroll) Skin.HasSetting(AutoScroll)
750 40 cirrus_20 31103 grey2 white listwhitegradient.png menuitemNF.png Skin.ToggleSetting(Show_SlideShow_Paused) !Skin.HasSetting(Show_SlideShow_Paused)
750 40 cirrus_20 31105 grey2 white listwhitegradient.png menuitemNF.png Skin.ToggleSetting(No_Media_Titles_In_Scanner) !Skin.HasSetting(No_Media_Titles_In_Scanner)
Script Artist Slide Show 750 40 cirrus_20 grey2 white 41011 Skin.ToggleSetting(Artistslideshow) Skin.HasSetting(Artistslideshow) listwhitegradient.png menuitemNF.png !Skin.HasSetting(Custombackground) + !Skin.HasSetting(BlackBackground) + !Skin.HasSetting(CDWallNoVisualisation)
750 40 cirrus_20 grey2 white 41263 listwhitegradient.png menuitemNF.png Skin.ToggleSetting(CDWallNoVisualisation) Skin.HasSetting(CDWallNoVisualisation) !Skin.HasSetting(Custombackground) + !Skin.HasSetting(BlackBackground) + !Skin.HasSetting(Artistslideshow)
CD Wall Picture Path 750 40 cirrus_20 grey2 white listwhitegradient.png menuitemNF.png 41264 $INFO[Skin.String(CDWall_Folder_Path)] Skin.SetPath(CDWall_Folder_Path) Skin.HasSetting(CDWallNoVisualisation) -->
Custom background 750 40 cirrus_20 grey2 white 41012 Skin.ToggleSetting(CustomBackground) Skin.HasSetting(CustomBackground) listwhitegradient.png menuitemNF.png !Skin.HasSetting(Artistslideshow) + !Skin.HasSetting(BlackBackground) + !Skin.HasSetting(CDWallNoVisualisation)
Black background 750 40 cirrus_20 grey2 white 41013 Skin.ToggleSetting(BlackBackground) Skin.HasSetting(BlackBackground) listwhitegradient.png menuitemNF.png !Skin.HasSetting(Artistslideshow) + !Skin.HasSetting(CustomBackground) + !Skin.HasSetting(CDWallNoVisualisation)
750 45 cirrus_20 512 accent black left center
750 40 cirrus_20 41211 grey2 white listwhitegradient.png menuitemNF.png Skin.ToggleSetting(Use_Startup_Playlist) Skin.HasSetting(Use_Startup_Playlist) !Skin.HasSetting(Use_Startup_VideoPlaylist)
Startup Music Playlist Path 750 40 cirrus_20 grey2 white 41212 $INFO[Skin.String(Startup_Playlist_Path)] Skin.SetFile(Startup_Playlist_Path,,special://MusicPlaylists/) listwhitegradient.png menuitemNF.png Skin.HasSetting(Use_Startup_Playlist)
750 40 cirrus_20 41213 grey2 white listwhitegradient.png menuitemNF.png Skin.ToggleSetting(Use_Startup_VideoPlaylist) Skin.HasSetting(Use_Startup_VideoPlaylist) !Skin.HasSetting(Use_Startup_Playlist)
Startup Video Playlist Path 750 40 cirrus_20 grey2 white 41214 $INFO[Skin.String(Startup_VideoPlaylist_Path)] Skin.SetFile(Startup_VideoPlaylist_Path,,special://VideoPlaylists/) listwhitegradient.png menuitemNF.png Skin.HasSetting(Use_Startup_VideoPlaylist)
750 40 cirrus_20 41215 grey2 white listwhitegradient.png menuitemNF.png Skin.ToggleSetting(Use_Startup_DreamVideo) Skin.HasSetting(Use_Startup_DreamVideo) !Skin.HasSetting(Use_Startup_Playlist) + !Skin.HasSetting(Use_Startup_VideoPlaylist)
Dream Video Path 750 40 cirrus_20 grey2 white 41216 $INFO[Skin.String(Startup_DreamVideo_Path)] Skin.SetFile(Startup_DreamVideo_Path) listwhitegradient.png menuitemNF.png Skin.HasSetting(Use_Startup_DreamVideo)
750 45 cirrus_20 31102 accent black left center

750 40 cirrus_20 31125 grey2 white listwhitegradient.png menuitemNF.png Skin.ToggleSetting(ShowBackgroundVis) !Skin.HasSetting(ShowBackgroundVis)
750 40 cirrus_20 41265 grey2 white listwhitegradient.png menuitemNF.png Skin.ToggleSetting(ShowBackgroundVideoBrowser) !Skin.HasSetting(ShowBackgroundVideoBrowser)
